channel.title: Tool tips? LIME GREEN?
channel.description:
SO, ive noticed a error on my client.. all the tool tips are lime green. I can't figure out why. but i need to change them back to black.. it's not the interfaces. it something in the client files. I'd upload a picture, but i have to click a button or use my mouse to set the size of the image. and tool tips you have to hover over. making it impossible.. but if anyone has a solution. please help..
P.S. The tool tips im talking about are in the skill tab. they are the little yellow boxes that show up saying your current xp and the xp needed for the next level

item.title: Tool tips? LIME GREEN?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“i0wn3v3ry, post:2, topic:389863”]It’s called don’t leech (:

But you need to find the colour of the lime green, I think.[/quote]

Um, i didn’t leach. I’ve been working on this client for months now and i acedentally changed something in Lins interface editor and now i cant figure out what i did

Read full topic
